languages.text: "Пожалуй... Я действительно осознала могущество тех, кто скрывается в ослепительном сиянии подобных вам светил, шерин. Стать ли мне тенью, что поддерживает свет и порядок в обход закостенелых законов? Не очередной пешкой {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссии Касбаллика{/g}, а полноправным Теневым Бароном Простора? Силой куда более могущественной и устрашающей, чем скромный торгаш-наместник?"

traits.locale_text: "Пожалуй... Я действительно осознала могущество тех, кто скрывается в ослепительном сиянии подобных вам светил, шерин. Стать ли мне тенью, что поддерживает свет и порядок в обход закостенелых законов? Не очередной пешкой g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссии Касбаллика{/g}, а полноправным Теневым Бароном Простора? Силой куда более могущественной и устрашающей, чем скромный торгаш-наместник?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "You may have a point... I truly have realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. Should I become a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right? A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward?"
languages.original_text: "Пожалуй... Я действительно осознала могущество тех, кто скрывается в ослепительном сиянии подобных вам светил, шерин. Стать ли мне тенью, что поддерживает свет и порядок в обход закостенелых законов? Не очередной пешкой {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссии Касбаллика{/g}, а полноправным Теневым Бароном Простора? Силой куда более могущественной и устрашающей, чем скромный торгаш-наместник?"

traits.locale_text: "You may have a point... I did wise up to the power of those who hide in the blinding light of the glorious suns like yourself, shereen. Should I become a shadow that upholds the order and the light bypassing the antiquated laws? Not yet another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right? A power far more imperious and intimidating than a penny-pinching steward?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You may have a point... I did wise up to the power of those who hide in the blinding light of the glorious suns like yourself, shereen. Should I become a shadow that upholds the order and the light bypassing the antiquated laws? A power far more imperious and intimidating than a penny-pinching steward?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right? Should I become a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right? A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你说的确实有道理……我已经切实地意识到了某种力量。那些拥有力量的人们，藏在你发出的刺眼明光之中，亲爱的。我应该成为明光中的阴影，绕过那些早已过时的律法，维护秩序与光明吗？我不该继续当{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团{/g}的走卒，而要亲自成为科罗努斯扩区的阴影男爵吗？成为比那些一文不名的管家更加强大、更加可怕的力量，是吗？”
languages.original_text: "You may have a point... I truly have realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. Should I become a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right? A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward?"

traits.locale_text: “你说的确实有道理……我已经切实地意识到了某种力量。那些拥有力量的人们，藏在你发出的刺眼明光之中，亲爱的。我应该成为明光中的阴影，绕过那些早已过时的律法，维护秩序与光明吗？我不该继续当{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团{/g}的走卒，而要亲自成为科罗努斯扩区的阴影男爵吗？成为比那些一文不名的管家更加强大、更加可怕的力量，是吗？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "You may have a point... I truly have realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. Should I become a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws? Not another pawn of the Kasballica Mission but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right? A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward?"

languages.text: «Puede que tenga razón... He comprendido el poder de quienes se ocultan en la luz cegadora de faros como usted, shereen. ¿Debería convertirme en una sombra para mantener el orden y la esperanza sorteando leyes anticuadas? ¿No como una esbirra más de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}misión Kasballica{/g}, sino como una baronesa sombría de la Extensión por derecho propio? ¿Como un poder mucho más imperioso y temible que el de un simple chupatintas obsesionado con las cuentas?».
languages.original_text: "You may have a point... I truly have realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. Should I become a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right? A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward?"

traits.locale_text: «Puede que tenga razón... He comprendido el poder de quienes se ocultan en la luz cegadora de faros como usted, shereen. ¿Debería convertirme en una sombra para mantener el orden y la esperanza sorteando leyes anticuadas? ¿No como una esbirra más de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}misión Kasballica{/g}, sino como una baronesa sombría de la Extensión por derecho propio? ¿Como un poder mucho más imperioso y temible que el de un simple chupatintas obsesionado con las cuentas?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「一理あるかもしれない…あんたのようなまばゆい光の中に隠れる者の力を、あたしはよく実感しているんだ。あたしは時代遅れの法律を回避することで、秩序と光を守る影になるべきなのかしら？{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ聖務団{/g}の手先ではなく、エクスパンスの影の男爵になるべきなんだろうか？どんな小銭稼ぎの執事より専制的で、強固な権力に？」
languages.original_text: "You may have a point... I truly have realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. Should I become a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right? A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward?"

traits.locale_text: 「一理あるかもしれない…あんたのようなまばゆい光の中に隠れる者の力を、あたしはよく実感しているんだ。あたしは時代遅れの法律を回避することで、秩序と光を守る影になるべきなのかしら？{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ聖務団{/g}の手先ではなく、エクスパンスの影の男爵になるべきなんだろうか？どんな小銭稼ぎの執事より専制的で、強固な権力に？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt vielleicht nicht unrecht ... Ich habe begriffen, wie viel Macht jene haben, die sich im gleißenden Schein von Lichtgestalten wie Euch verbergen, Shereen. Soll ich zum Schatten werden, der die Ordnung und das Licht aufrecht erhält, indem er antiquierte Gesetze umgeht? Keine weitere Marionette der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, sondern ein eigenständiger Schattenbaron der Ausdehnung? Eine Macht, die viel gefährlicher und formidabler ist als jeder knausrige Truchsess?"
languages.original_text: "You may have a point... I truly have realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. Should I become a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right? A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt vielleicht nicht unrecht ... Ich habe begriffen, wie viel Macht jene haben, die sich im gleißenden Schein von Lichtgestalten wie Euch verbergen, Shereen. Soll ich zum Schatten werden, der die Ordnung und das Licht aufrecht erhält, indem er antiquierte Gesetze umgeht? Keine weitere Marionette der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, sondern ein eigenständiger Schattenbaron der Ausdehnung? Eine Macht, die viel gefährlicher und formidabler ist als jeder knausrige Truchsess?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez peut-être raison... J'ai bien vu le pouvoir que détiennent ceux qui se cachent derrière l'éclat aveuglant des lumières telles que vous, shereen. Vaut-il mieux que je devienne une ombre qui préserve l'ordre et la lumière en contournant les lois archaïques ? Pas un pion parmi tant d'autres au service de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Mission de la Kasballica{/g}, mais une baronne de l'ombre à part entière dans les Étendues ? C'est un pouvoir bien plus impérieux et plus formidable que celui d'une simple intendante âpre au gain. »
languages.original_text: "You may have a point... I truly have realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. Should I become a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right? A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez peut-être raison... J'ai bien vu le pouvoir que détiennent ceux qui se cachent derrière l'éclat aveuglant des lumières telles que vous, shereen. Vaut-il mieux que je devienne une ombre qui préserve l'ordre et la lumière en contournant les lois archaïques ? Pas un pion parmi tant d'autres au service de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Mission de la Kasballica{/g}, mais une baronne de l'ombre à part entière dans les Étendues ? C'est un pouvoir bien plus impérieux et plus formidable que celui d'une simple intendante âpre au gain. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Haklılık payın var. Senin gibi ışık kaynaklarının kör edici parıltısı altına sığınanların ne büyük güçlere kavuşabileceğini gördüm şirinim. Antika kanunların etrafından dolaşarak düzenin ve ışığın hüküm sürmesini sağlayan gölgelerden olmalı mıyım? {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Misyonu'nun{/g} piyonu değil de Enginlik'te kendi iradesince hareket eden bir Gölge Baronu... Sinekten yağ çıkaran bir idareciden ziyade daha otoriter, daha dişli bir güç olmalı mıyım?"
languages.original_text: "You may have a point... I truly have realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. Should I become a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right? A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward?"

traits.locale_text: "Haklılık payın var. Senin gibi bir ışık kaynağının kör edici ışığının yarattığı gölgelerde gizlenenlerin ne kadar büyük bir güce sahip olabileceklerini gördüm şirinim. Antika kanunların etrafından dolaşarak düzenin ve ışığın hüküm sürmesini sağlayacak bir gölge olmalı mıyım? {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Misyonu{/g}'nun bir piyonu değil, Enginlik'te kendi iradesince hareket eden bir Gölge Baronu? Sinekten yağ çıkaran bir idareciden çok daha otoriter ve çok daha dişli bir güç?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
